import fastcore, fastai, pylab, nbdev
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def plot(func,**kargs):
    x=torch.arange(-7,7,.1)
    pylab.clf()
    pylab.grid(color='k', alpha=0.2, linestyle='dashdot')
    pylab.plot(x,func(x,**kargs).data.numpy())
    pylab.xlim([-7,7])
    pylab.ylim([-7,7])
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
